title: Bloomberg Markets: Massocca Focusing on 'Amish Trade' for Value
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Massocca Focusing on 'Amish Trade' for Value
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steve Massocca Managing Director Wedbush Securities Discussing looking for value in the markets by focusing on non-tech companies.
